alert.note: Alert for San Miguel (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 15 at 6:50PM MDT until July 15 at 8:15PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR EAST CENTRAL SAN MIGUEL COUNTY... At 650 PM MDT, local law enforcement reported thunderstorms producing moderate to heavy rain in the Sawpit area Highway 145. Flash flooding and mudslides have already occurred. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Sawpit, Fall Creek and Placerville. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
